item.title: Angular 4 - Create a modal
item.description: After my previous post about creating a simple accordion with angular 4, I will now walk you through my implementation of a modal in angular 4. To create the modal I used two files modal.component.ts and modal.service.ts and organised it in the usual component based architecture.
